name: ibbmod
body:
# ibbmod
Japanese Discussion Board Software - Translated

It might not look like its translated in the code itself, but it has been tested, and everything that needs to be translated, is translated.

## Installation
Drag and drop the contents of the zip file into your FTP client that is connected to your WebServer. Refresh your page and you should be good to go!



Translated Japanese discussion board software.
